text:
It is nice that the <stcheckout> task allows you to define the date format 
that the date is in (i.e. the asofdateformat attribute)

Can you provide a similar attribute on the <stlabel> task so that we do not 
have to concern ourselves with how StarTeam expects the date
creator: ninju_bohra@yahoo.com

text: starteam ant tasks have been removed starting with Ant 1.8.0
creator: antoine@apache.org
